description: Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi addresses the nation through his Radio Address, Mann Ki Baat. This month's episode sees citizens from various corners of the nation addressing their questions and sug
caption: soundcloud.com
message:
Today, on #WorldTuberculosisDay I am sharing once again what I had spoken during #MannKiBaat in March last year.

When it comes to TB, correct and complete treatment is essential. This disease can be cured. Do hear. https://soundcloud.com/narendramodi/pm-modi-on-tuberculosis
